pkgmetadata.longdescription: Creates Interface with NASA 'Exoplanets Archive API' // Provides a user-friendly interface to NASA 'Exoplanets Archive API' https://exoplanetarchive.ipac.caltech.edu/, enabling retrieval and analysis of exoplanetary and stellar data. Includes functions for querying, filtering, summarizing, and computing derived parameters from the 'Exoplanets' catalog.
